title: Stage Lv7-P6-S32
description: Level 7 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: It was precisely because of his dedication that the project succeeded beyond all expectations.
It is not merely the technology that matters, but how we implement it that determines success.
learning_points: Level 7 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 정확히 그의 헌신 때문에 프로젝트가 모든 기대를 넘어 성공했다.
sentences.en: It was precisely because of his dedication that the project succeeded beyond all expectations.

sentences.kr: 중요한 것은 단순히 기술이 아니라, 그것을 어떻게 구현하느냐가 성공을 결정한다는 것이다.
sentences.en: It is not merely the technology that matters, but how we implement it that determines success.

sentences.kr: 협력적인 노력을 통해서만 극복할 수 없어 보이는 도전들을 극복할 수 있었다.
sentences.en: It was only through collaborative effort that we were able to overcome the seemingly insurmountable challenges.

sentences.kr: 바로 이 혁신적인 접근 방식이 우리를 경쟁에서 차별화시켰다.
sentences.en: It was this innovative approach that differentiated us from the competition.

sentences.kr: 고객의 피드백이야말로 우리가 제품을 개선하는 원동력이다.
sentences.en: It is customer feedback that drives us to improve our products continuously.

sentences.kr: 자금 부족 때문이 아니라 명확한 전략의 부재 때문에 프로젝트가 실패했다.
sentences.en: It was not due to lack of funding, but rather the absence of a clear strategy that the project failed.

sentences.kr: 지속적인 학습과 적응을 통해서만 빠르게 변화하는 시장에서 성공할 수 있다.
sentences.en: It is only through continuous learning and adaptation that we can succeed in the rapidly changing market.

sentences.kr: 바로 이런 어려운 시기에 진정한 리더십이 시험받는 것이다.
sentences.en: It is during such challenging times that true leadership is truly tested and revealed.
